title: Can Urgot at least get this 2 changes as life quality changes so it doesn't feel like hell playing h
body:
{{champion:6}} is one of the few champions that struggling badly in top lane right now special during laning phase and can get easily punished/ganked and killed due to that.

So here is two things that i would suggest and i hope some of the balance team consider them or atleast do something around them to make it less hell to play Urgot.

First change :
Increase Urgot range from 350 to 400 or 450 , if he going to be punished by nerfed Conquer, {{item:1054}} and {{item:3022}} plus the ability of not able to buy {{item:3053}} atleast give him a range to be able to poke people in lane and farm safe , and that not big buff it just making his range match the likes of him like {{champion:150}} .

And second change : 
Can you very please allow his W to auto lock on the targets he AA , the point of this is not to make it death stance for Urgot if he missed his E or Q during fight and got stuck in minion wave, infact it would encourage the Urgot play to tab in and out of W to use AA to make sure he can stay on his target.

And i honestly think this changes would never make him over the line or anything, plus they not buffs just things to make it less of hell to play Urgot special early, where your actual power spike is after level 11.

I agree on that need special treat just the likes of garen

Onetrick here, honestly the only things i want is;

1. Mana cost on q to be reverted so you can last any amount of time in lane, currently his q cost forces him to start corrupting potion and even then you can't use your q to last hit or poke while having enough mana to for a trade.  Especially now since every other champion top seems to be able to spam abilities relentlessly without dipping under half mana.  That and the increasing amount of free resource champions with their free sustain (looking at you vlad, garen, gnar and soon to be sett)

2. His e should be able to cross terrain, almost every other champion that has a dash is able to cross terrain or at the very least not get stuck with no dash or cc if you stand too close to a wall, have a dead turret anywhere on your screen (it feels like) or yoricks ring that means you cant grab him even if he's standing on you

3. Slightly more movespeed or at least less movespeed anti-steroid on the w,  375 with tier 2 boots on a glorified melee means right now almost everything can just run away from you if you cant kill them within a certain couple seconds window without your ult.

I do agree with the if you're not locked on in a minion wave thing though, it is very annoying to have your w attacking minions and not the jax pounding away at you. But i would see that as a 'well i guess i should have turned it off there and just autoed or not missed the other abilities'.
